course_title: Pediatric Acute Care Nurse Practitioner II
course_description: Students will plan interventions to stabilize the pediatric patient, minimize complications, promote physical/psychological well-being, restore maximal health potential and evaluate risk factors to achieving these outcomes.
prerequisites: NRSG 661or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
sections: Class Nbr: 1482, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: A. Brown, Status: Open
